column2: "Wow! That person's clothes are so nice! Those accessories, too! They're wonderful! Where can I get them?"
"Oh, you're <%me>! Ehehe, I'm Akhtar Al-alef! So, this is the ARKS ship!"
"Amazing! It's incredible! I'm glad I got permission to come here with Gene and look around!"
"Oh, that's right! I think Gene had something she wanted to say. Why don't you talk to her?"
"People in the ARKS ship are really fashionable!"
"So sparkly... So shiny... I want to wear nice clothes like those too!"
"Waah! I wasn't looking and I nearly walked into you!"
"Ehehe... This is my first time seeing all this, so I'm looking all around to take in as much as I can!"
"I just finished making that pendant out of white flowers, so I've given it to Gene!!"
"Everyone in ARKS is so kind to me... This is a really nice place! I love it here!!"
"Whenever I say my name is Akhtar Al-alef, people look at me strangely. Why is that?"
"Al-alef... I guess it's rare to have a family name like that here. Everyone here seems to only have one name."
"That's right... Gene and Annette are the same."
"I wonder if people can tell that I'm a Darknix... That's a scary thought!"
